1.0.name: wordpress/ljpl-armored-robotstxt
1.0.description:
robots.txt

is a file, which tell's search engines, which parts of your site it can display publicly. This plugin add's some entries to this file, to make your site safer from some attacks, keeping all your stength in seo intact ex. allowing search engine robots to harvest pictures for image search. When preparing a new site in Wordpress, it's one of the first plugins I install.
